title: LENOVO IDEAPAD SLIM 3 15IAH8 I5-12450H/16GB DDR5/1TB
description:
Лаптоп

Чипсет: Intel® SoC Platform
Процесор: Intel® Core™ i5-12450H, 8C (4P + 4E) / 12T, P-core 2.0 / 4.4GHz, E-core 1.5 / 3.3GHz, 12MB
